content: स्फार {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [स्फाय्-रक् <ls>Uṇ. 2. 13</ls>] {@--1@} Large, great, increased, expanded; स्फारफुल्लत्फणापीठनिर्यत् &c. <ls>Māl. 5. 23</ls>, <ls>Mv. 6. 32.</ls> {@--2@} Much, abundant; <ls>Mv. 5. 2</ls>; <ls>Bh. 3. 42.</ls> {@--3@} Loud. --रः {@--1@} Swelling, increase, enlargement, growth. {@--2@} A bubble (in gold). {@--3@} A protuberance. {@--4@} Throbbing, quivering, palpitation, vibration. {@--5@} Twanging. --रं Abundance, much, plenty. (स्फारीभू {1} to swell out, expand, spread out, increase, multiply; सुस्निग्धा विमुखीभवंति सुहृदः स्फारीभवंत्यापदः <ls>Mk. 1. 36</ls>; <ls>Pt. 5. 24.</ls> {2} to become manifest.).
